original_text: Nobody understands the mind of the Lord. Nobody can be his advisor, to tell him what he should do. Nobody understands the mind of the Lord. Nobody can be his advisor, to tell him what he should do. Nobody understands the mind of the Lord. Nobody can be his advisor, to tell him what he should do. Nobody understands the mind of the Lord. Nobody can be his advisor, to tell him what he should do. Nobody understands the mind of the Lord.
korean_text: 누가 여호와의 영을 지도하였으며 그의 모사가 되어 그를 가르쳤으랴

sentences.original_text: Nobody understands the mind of the Lord.

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그의 조언자가 될 수 없으며,

sentences.original_text: to tell him what he should do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 무엇을 해야 할지 말해줄 수 없다.
